#summary buttonTo([host,text,source,route,anchor,onlyPath,params,controller,disable,action,protocol,id,url,confirm])
#labels api,0.8,view,helper

*Description*:

Creates a form containing a single button that submits to the URL. The URL is built the same way as the linkTo function.

*Return Type*:

String

*

*Parameters*:

||   || *Type* || *Required* || *Default* || *Description* ||
|| *host* || string || false ||  || See documentation for URLFor ||
|| *text* || string || false ||  || The text content of the link. ||
|| *source* || string || false ||  || If you want to use an image for the button pass in the link to it here (relative from the /images/ folder). ||
|| *route* || string || false ||  || See documentation for URLFor ||
|| *anchor* || string || false ||  || See documentation for URLFor ||
|| *onlyPath* || boolean || false || true || See documentation for URLFor ||
|| *params* || string || false ||  || See documentation for URLFor ||
|| *controller* || string || false ||  || See documentation for URLFor ||
|| *disable* || any || false ||  || Pass in true if you want the button to be disabled when clicked (can help prevent multiple clicks). Pass in a string if you want the button disabled and the text on the button updated (to 'please wait...' for example). ||
|| *action* || string || false ||  || See documentation for URLFor ||
|| *protocol* || string || false ||  || See documentation for URLFor ||
|| *id* || numeric || false || 0 || See documentation for URLFor ||
|| *url* || string || false ||  || If linking to a direct URL, pass in that URL here. ||
|| *confirm* || string || false ||  || Pass a message here to cause a JavaScript confirmation dialogue box to pop up containing the message. ||



*Examples*:

{{{
#buttonTo(action="delete", disabled="Wait...")#

}}}

*Related*:

 * [linkingPages] (chapter)
 * [linkTo linkTo()] (function)
 * [URLFor URLFor()] (function)
